pageContext.name: sam
pageContext.rawContent:
Sam DiBella

EN

I'm a 2nd-year PhD student at the University of Maryland, College Park, at the College of Information Studies. My main research interests are privacy and surveillance technologies, but I used to work as an academic editor for SpringerNature. I enjoy publishing work both for the material use of information sharing, but also for the community and shared purpose that it can create.

I have more information about my writing and research on my personal website.
